snippet: When protesters succeeded in ousting President Ali Abdullah Saleh in 2012, it seemed especially promising for women. But that hope has unraveled.
lead_paragraph: When protesters succeeded in ousting President Ali Abdullah Saleh in 2012, it seemed especially promising for women. But that hope has unraveled.

headline.main: In Yemen, a Brief Moment Before Women Were Pushed Aside Again
